* Last check:

*
* Map List:
* 
*   NONE
*
* Type of restriction / nature of hazard:
*   - "Tactical Leadership Programme" CSAR exercises.
*
* Time of activity:
*   - HX (Announced by NOTAM.)
*
* Remark for paragliders:
*   - No real added value to show this zone on the maps
